title: The Demon-Like Lover of the Playful Lord - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Shoujo   Supernatural
tags: Ancient China   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Character Growth   Cute Story   Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist
author: 十月喵喵
description: Mu Chang’an went back in time and found herself extremely unfortunate to become a teardrop hanging on a pagoda tree. After she finally turned into a pretty woman, she was made the fifth bride of King Rui. She tried every means possible to flee from the marriage, only to find herself entangled with a playful lord for her whole life.>
